name: There Is No Ghost
description:
REPEAT THE SENTENCE: THERE IS NO GHOST

Play as a stranded one in a haunted mansion, journeying his way to the exit door. All he needs are keys for the locked doors... and the belief that ghost is not real. Get ready to repetitively remind the stranded one that THERE IS NO GHOST every second in the mansion by tapping SPACE key. Failure to do so will attract thing that is not real~

CONTROL:

LEFT/RIGHT keys: Move stranded one

UP key: Unlock/enter door

SPACE bar: Reminder for THERE IS NO GHOST
